item.title: Fragrance Du Bois opens a temporary store at Tangs in Singapore
item.description: Source: Fragrance Du Bois. Fragrance Du Bois has opened a temporary boutique at TANGS, a major department store in Singapore’s Orchard Road shopping area, until September 4, 2015. This marks their second appearance at TANGS this year. The pop-up offers customers a direct encounter with niche perfumery and showcases Fragrance Du Bois’ fragrances, all made with 100% pure, natural oud. Nicola Parker, Brand Director of Fragrance Du Bois, noted a rising interest in niche perfumery.

item.title: Asia Plantation Capital is researching the advantages of agarwood
item.description: Source: Asia Plantation Capital website. Asia Plantation Capital (APC) has initiated a new investment program to collaborate with Southeast Asian academics in studying the science of agarwood, a valuable substance derived from infected Aquilaria trees and known by various names like gaharu, jinkoh, aloeswood, and oud. The program aims to pinpoint areas for in-depth research and potential clinical trials to gain approval from European and American medical authorities. In Thailand, APC’s partnership with Prince Songkhla University, led by Prof.
